Text:
Hi James!
Are you going to upload these episodes.
They have been aired in Nick Latin and I think they will be aired  the 7 and 8 of April.(US i think)
U01  "Alienated"
U02 	"The Otter Woman"
U03 	"Operation: Good Deed"
U04 	"When the Chips are Down"
Thank you for a good job,
Johan

Hi Johan,

I couldn't find the English version of the episodes you mentioned; I could only find them dubbed in Spanish :)

If you understand Spanish, you can watch these episodes on Youtube (just search for "PoM-2x34-L'altra llĂşdria", and check out the related videos or the uploader's channel - it should be uploaded by  PoMNelewy - to see the rest of the episodes).

Of course, as soon as they air on Nick US, I'll be more than happy to upload them here :)

James
dude you're excellent! I'm gnna soon update my penguins torrent and add everything else into it, season 1 and season 2. thanks, you're a star!
